question: Do I need to be a Nivolia member to attend the event?
answer: No — our events are open to everyone! Members receive early access and discounted tickets, but guests and newcomers are always welcome to join.

question: Will the event be available online?
answer: Yes. Nivolia Connect will be hosted in-person in London and streamed live for our global audience. Virtual attendees will also get access to session recordings.

question: What should I bring to the event?
answer: Bring your curiosity, business cards, and an open mind. A notebook or laptop is optional but great for taking notes and capturing contacts.

question: Can I apply to speak or host a roundtable?
answer: Absolutely! We accept speaker and facilitator applications until November 24. Send a short pitch to speak@nivolia.com with your topic and bio.

question: Are tickets refundable?
answer: Tickets are refundable up to 7 days before the event. If you can’t make it, you can also transfer your ticket to another attendee at no cost.

question: How can I become a sponsor or partner?
answer: We collaborate with companies, startups, and community organizations to power our events. Email partnerships@nivolia.com for details on sponsorship packages.
